name: SleepTight
0:
”Alexa, open Sleep Tight and tuck me in”
”Alexa, open Sleep Tight and put me to sleep”
”Alexa, open Sleep Tight and tell me good night”

des: This a skill that lets your friend Alexa help you go to sleep by providing some much needed late night support!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
